snippet: The big indexes drifted down slightly, leaving the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index down 1.6 percent for September, its third monthly drop this year.
abstract: Major indexes drift to slight loss to end stormy month in the stock market.
lead_paragraph: The big indexes drifted down slightly, leaving the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index down 1.6 percent for September, its third monthly drop this year.

headline.main: Market Ends the Month With a Whimper
headline.print_headline: Market Ends the Month With a Whimper
